patterns: What is the Cost of Attendance for International Graduate student?
Cost of Attendance for Graduate International?
COA Graduate International
What is the basic tuition fees?
responses: I like that you are planning your finances! The average Cost of Attendance for an International Graduate student is $50,000. You can get the breakdown and more informationa at this link!

patterns: How many credits are required for full-time enrollment?
How many credits per semester?
credits/semester?
responses: For full time enrollment, 12 credits are required for undergraduates and 9 credits for graduates.

patterns: Is housing from the University mandatory?
Is meal plan from the University mandatory?
responses: No, it is not mandatory. :)
It is your personal choice! :)

patterns: What are the admission requirements?
Can you tell me admission requirement?
responses: While each of ASU's graduate programs has unique admission standards, ASU has set minimum requirements for admission to master's, certificate and doctoral programs.

Hi there, I have something called top 10 tips for you to look at. It should help. You should take advantage of resources that will help you prepare your application.
  1. Find a program you're interested in
  2. You can start the application, save your work and return to it
  3. Gather contact information from your recommenders for letter of recommendation
  4. Prepare a list of all the colleges and schools you've attended and when
  5. You may be asked to submit a personal statement
  6. Former students should have their ASU ID number handy
  7. Update your resume
  8. Have your unofficial transcripts available
  9. Find if to GRE or not to GRE
  10. We recommend you start the application process as early as possible. Learn more about ASU's Explore Graduate School Seminars and test preparation programs.

patterns: What are the steps to apply for masters?
What are the steps to apply for MS?
How can I apply to ASU?
Can you guide me to apply for my program?
I don't know how to apply to school, can you help me?
responses:
Sure, I can tell you it's easy process involving four steps
  1. Ensure you meet admission requirements
  2. Complete a graduate admission application
  3. Pay the application fee
  4. Submit any additional materials

More info can be found here

patterns: What are the set of documents I would need to apply?
Can you tell me what documents I would be required to submit?
Do you what are basic documents needed for application process?
I don't know what documents are needed to apply to school, can you help me?
responses:
Don't worry I am here. Documents needed to apply to graduate school are Transcripts, Official test scores, Additional support materials. For international applicants English proficiency and Visa and immigration docs.

More info can be found here

patterns: When do I apply for grad school?
When is the right time to apply to the school?
When do grad school application begins
responses: The application for admission opens almost a year prior to the academic term you would begin your studies. Use the chart above for graduate application open dates for both fall and spring semesters.

patterns: What is the grad school application deadline?
What is the last date to apply?
Am I late to apply?
Do you know the application deadlines
responses: Application deadlines are set and enforced by academic program offices. Specific deadline information can be found in the program descriptions on Degree Search. Please contact the academic program office offering the program for exceptions.

patterns: What type of visa do I need?
Which student visa do I need?
responses:
As an international student at Arizona State University, you will need to obtain an F-1 or J-1 student visa.

  • F-1 student visa
  • J-1 student visa
  • F-2 dependent visa (undergraduate)
  • F-2 dependent visa (graduate)
